Title: Sworn to the Sword
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Deedee Magno
Plot: Pearl teaches Connie how to sword fight on Steven's request but it doesn't go quite as planned.
